name: Lumo-Cannon
description:
Move around the map and use your cannon to take out targets within the time limit! 

Jump off your vehicle in slow motion to aim with better precision. 

For ammo, absorb light from nearby light sources.

Credits:

Concept & Programming - UmerQazi

Tree & Target Concept, Light Orb Material - Hummad Sheikh

Soundtrack by Craze Music Productions

Sound Effects by MGWSoundDesign
